description: Eotaxin-3 - 53-fold overexpressed in EoE; eosinophil chemoattractant
IL-4/IL-13 signaling - Th2 pathway transcription factor
Interleukin-13 - Key Th2 cytokine driving epithelial dysfunction
Thymic stromal lymphopoietin - Epithelial alarmin; Th2 initiation
Charcot-Leyden crystal protein - Eosinophil granule marker
Desmoglein-1 - Barrier integrity; downregulated in EoE
Filaggrin - Epithelial barrier; associated with atopic diseases
